testcase.name: Validate the Buttons component under Elements Tile
testcase.system-out: Given User launched a Browser...............................................passed When User opens url "https://demoqa.com"....................................passed Then User verify title of landing Page "DEMOQA".............................passed When User cliks on Elements tab.............................................passed Then User clicks on Buttons button on left rail elements....................passed And User perform double click action on Double Click Me button and verify the Result "You have done a double click".passed And User perform right click action on Right Click Me button and verify the Result "You have done a right click".passed And User perform click action on Click Me button and verify the Result "You have done a dynamic click".passed And User close the browser..................................................passed

testcase.name: Validate the WebTables component under Elements Tile
testcase.system-out: Given User launched a Browser...............................................passed When User opens url "https://demoqa.com"....................................passed Then User verify title of landing Page "DEMOQA".............................passed When User cliks on Elements tab.............................................passed Then User clicks on Web Tables button on left rail elements.................passed And User verify the Column headers of webtable as "First Name" "Last Name" "Age" "Email" "Salary" "Department" "Action".passed And User edit the details on Row-II of table "Ellise" "Perry" "27" "ep@example.com" "1000000" "CCKTR".passed And User verify the updated details of Row-II "Ellise" "Perry" "27" "ep@example.com" "1000000" "CCKTR".passed And User delete the record-II...............................................passed And User add a new record "Kittu" "Sharma" "25" "ks@example.com" "1" "Berozgar".passed And User verify the new record in table "Kittu" "Sharma" "25" "ks@example.com" "1" "Berozgar".passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
